attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Spicy chicken with mozzarella cheese (dakkalbi) , Bulgogi with mozzarella cheese, and Sooda Box

attributes.about_this_biz_history: We were small, now we are big.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Breakfast food.

attributes.about_this_biz_history: We have a long history of making food for locals in Burnaby and Vancouver. Feeding people is our passion, it’s what we LOVE to do. Our recipes provide a link between our multigenerational family and our Greek heritage.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties:
We believe dinner is an opportunity for sharing. The best kind of sharing starts with an experience, something that stimulates the senses in an extraordinary way. Once you share something like that with someone, it gets easier to ask questions, share stories, and get to know each other.

At Olove, we aim to give you a platform to get to know each other. That platform is elevated food, fragrant wine and sumptious aperitifs. Come in, share and let us unlock the story inside of you.

attributes.about_this_biz_history: Small family owned and operated restaurant, small menu but big taste!
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Specializing in freshly baked Bánh Mì and Delicious Pho!

attributes.about_this_biz_history: Cockney Kings is a 2 location, family owned Fish & Chip restaurant with a long history in Burnaby and New Westminster. Established in 1965, we've been serving the best fish & chips this side of the pond to the amazing communities in Burnaby and New West.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: At Cockney King's, we are a family owned and operated restaurant serving the community with brilliant fish and chips since 1965! When you dine here, you're not just a customer, you're family! We know fish and chips. Thats what we do best!

attributes.about_this_biz_history:
Take Sushi Japanese Restaurant has been serving authentic Japanese 
cuisine in the North Burnaby area since 2006. In Japanese, "TAKE" means bamboo.
Bamboo symbolizes the resilience of life, longevity, happiness and spiritual truth.
We always try to share the happiness with every customer. The owner has extensive 
experience and innovative thoughts. In here, we offer not only the ordinary dishes, 
you could also try our new innovative sushi. Take Sushi is highly regarded for 
presenting the finest and freshest cuisine. Enjoy your time in Take, our friendly 
staff will bring you a genuine experience.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties:
Take Sushi Japanese Restaurant has been serving authentic Japanese

 staff will bring you a genuine experience.

attributes.about_this_biz_history: Founded in Canada in 1992, JOEY Restaurants is an award-winning, globally inspired brand with a collection of elevated yet comfortable restaurants. JOEY Restaurants' thoughtfully crafted menu features recipes representing cuisine and hospitality standards from across the globe, curated from journeys by the brand's leadership and culinary teams. From fire-torched sushi and premium cuts of steak to comforting bowls, burgers and handhelds, JOEY Restaurants is committed to blending local culture with innovative and fresh techniques, resulting in delicious harmony of ingredients. Each JOEY Restaurant location is unique, but they all have plenty in common: great food, lively environments, and exceptional dining experiences.

attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Fresh Greek Food

attributes.about_this_biz_history: We are a small family owned and operated restaurant that takes pride in our Vietnamese cooking heritage.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Authentic Vietnamese Dishes.

Our pizza business stands out due to our fresh ingredients, quality dough, and amazing service. We learnt the art of making dough from the School of Italian Pizza ensuring an authentic, high quality base for our pizzas. Dough that is made to perfection, with carefully grafted pizza recipes will guarantee you coming back for more.

attributes.about_this_biz_history:
JoJu Tofu is an authentic Taiwanese food spot offers both tofu hotpot, but also bubble tea, also signature dishes like salty pepper chicken (chicken, rice, and soup), chicken nugget (chicken on rice with an egg), and blazing spicy pot (spicy seafood soup).

Welcome to share the joy of tasting delicious Taiwanese Food here!
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties:
JoJu Tofu is an authentic Taiwanese food spot offers both tofu hotpot, but also bubble tea, also signature dishes like salty pepper chicken (chicken, rice, and soup), chicken nugget (chicken on rice with an egg), and blazing spicy pot (spicy seafood soup).

Welcome to share the joy of tasting delicious Taiwanese Food here!

attributes.about_this_biz_bio:
Chef Harry Paskilidis immigrated from Greece in 1966.
Working as a dishwasher at a BC logging camp, he discovered his passion for the kitchen, and with dedication he soon became the chef--all the while dreaming of opening a restaurant of his own. After years of hard work in restaurants and hotels in the Vancouver area, Harry and his three brothers, Paul, Mike and Billy, opened Little Billy's Steak and Lobster House at 2nd and Nanaimo in Vancouver.
attributes.about_this_biz_history:
And so, Little Billy's delicious food (and the family that created it) could only be found at family events and functions, catering to the customers who just couldn't live without the familiar Greek touch.
Determined to start again Harry, Irma and their son Billy undertook the daunting task of finding a new location, a new concept, a new look and a new menu. Through courage and hard work this close-knit family has worked to combine the favourite dishes valued by their long-term customers  with new flavours created by Chef Harry, including the launch of their signature homemade garlic, lemon and special blend butter.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Little Billy's is a hybrid steakhouse with an "uptown" feel that provides a wining and dining experience that combines old favourites with new ones.
Full Kitchen Japanese Restaurant

A hidden gem in Brentwood. open till late night, Dine-in & take-out & Delivery
Korean food, Bibimbap, Gimbap, Korean Chicken, Beer, Soju, Vegetarian and Vegan food, Korean side dishes (Banchan)

We're Crazy About Ramen! JINYA is known for its slow-cooked approach to ramen, made from broths simmered for 20 hours in-house. From its customizable menu to sleek interiors, JINYA Ramen Bar presents a contemporary Japanese dining ideal for lively social gatherings for all ages.

attributes.about_this_biz_history: Some 30 years ago, Leroy Earl Fuller and his son Stanley Earl Fuller had a simple idea: a laid-back burger & beer joint. When the restaurant started, there was no question about what the name would be. It had to be called Earls. The restaurant quickly took off because, well, who would say no to burgers & beer? So they hired talented people and travelled the world to taste, drink and get inspired. Then they came back and applied all of that to the menu. And with that came attention and awards and even more talented people. A lot has changed since those early days. But Earls is still a family business. And itïs filled with people who are genuinely passionate about great food and drinks served in an inviting environment.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Welcome to Earls Brentwood, situated in the vibrant plaza of the Amazing Brentwood. Our covered patio offers a charming outdoor dining experience. For those on the move, our convenient take-out window ensures you can enjoy our delicious offerings anywhere. Immerse yourself in the local art scene with our two art walls, showcasing the talent of local artists. Start your day right with our enticing brunch options, available from 9am on weekends. Explore a world of flavours with our daily features, and join us for Happy Hour, late-night Happy Hour, and Brunch Happy Hour, where tempting deals on drinks and dishes await. Experience the perfect blend of taste, art, and ambiance at Earls Brentwood. Your table is ready. We can't wait to see you!
Canada's first premier hand roll bar serving a combination of fresh seafood, meticulously selected seaweed, and signature warm rice prepared to order in front of guests’ eyes.

Ajishou means ‘craftsman of taste’ in Japanese and
symbolizes our approach to serving the best local and
imported fish and seafood to meet the highest standards
of quality, freshness and seasonality, while combining
both modern-creative and traditional Japanese cooking
come visit us and  enjoy free drink which id included in your meal Monday to Thursday!
Japanese sushi restaurant

Live music on Friday and Saturday nights 
Capacity up to 100 people 
Private parking up to 20 lots

attributes.about_this_biz_history: Uncle Fatih's Pizza has been in business for 16 years and has 9 locations across the lower mainland.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Fresh ingredients and fresh dough made daily! We cater to all taste buds and special requirements, which include Vegetarian, Vegan and Gluten aware options!

attributes.about_this_biz_history: In 1958, two brothers borrowed $600 from their mom to open a pizza place in Wichita, Kansas. They named it Pizza Hut because their sign only had room for eight letters. How profound! Soon, the restaurant grew. Why? The pizza was awesome. The service felt like home. And the customers were treated like family. And we've been delivering that same food and service ever since. For the Love of Pizza Since 1958. From day one, the Carney brothers could look their customers in the eye and promise them the finest pizza in town -- because they knew the farmers who grew the ingredients, and they knew those farmers cared about quality. Since then, our farmers have grown right alongside us, and the ingredients we use are still our highest priority. No one loves pizza more than Pizza Hut. That's why pizza is in our name -- and always will be.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Get 50% off some of your favourite regular priced medium pizzas: Hawaiian, Pepperoni Lover's, Canadian, and Margherita pizzas. Online Only. Limited Time.

Glorious Bao & Fried Rice serves various kinds of handmade Dim Sum, snacks, fried rice, and other authentic Taiwanese cuisine such as the Popcorn Chicken and the Beef Brisket Noodle Soup.

Everything is freshly made upon ordering, and each combo comes with a free drink and a whole-milk Mango Panna Cotta dessert.
Soft-serve ice cream & signature shakes top the menu at this classic burger & fries fast-food chain.

attributes.about_this_biz_bio: Our burrito bar features bold Mexican flavours and high-quality ingredients.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Our burrito bar features bold Mexican flavours and high-quality ingredients.

attributes.about_this_biz_bio: I am the owner and operator for this deli and love it.
attributes.about_this_biz_history:
It started in the 70's, the owner make most of the Eastern European sausages, cabbage rolls and more from scratch. In the 80's, the second owner started the sandwich and soup because most of resident are European who work in the oil and refinery industry with Chevron, Shell and Imperial Oil company. 35 years later, Lotus cafe, only name changed from Rain Forest Deli still continue the tradition, in house roasted meat, smoked meat from local smoke house in Main Street.
Yes, the store is still look the same, new and old clientele, turkey and beef still roasted in the house, and still doing business in this location. The neighbour is changing rapidly, it is now more Shusi restaurant , Starbucks, Subway pop up every block and gradually losing the diversify and independent own small business charm here.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties:
We use local fresh produces, homemade soups, in store made to order fresh deli sandwiches or wraps like oven roasted beef and turkey( literally in house roasted),of course the famous Schnitzel sandwich, just to name a few. We also serve gluten free bread or wrap. 
Moreover , we will work with client menu ideas and budgets without compromise the quality and service.

attributes.about_this_biz_history:
Be A Part of History.
We don't think of ourselves as megalomaniacs, but our vision is grand: To create the finest burrito the world has ever seen. It starts with:

Our recipes. From over 20 years living in the Heart of Texas we perfected our most loved recipes and combined them into one freshly pressed in-house made tortilla.

Demand on freshness and quality. All of our recipes are made in-house, even our tortillas!

Our devotion and desire to bring you the best tasting burrito you've ever had. You'll know how much we care about serving good food when you take your first bite!

The menu features char-grilled, unmedicated steak and chicken and grilled veggie burritos and tacos. Most of our recipes are vegan friendly!

We hope to see you all soon.

about_this_biz_business_recommendation.description: Co-owned and supplied by InGrain Pastificio. Sample some of our wonderfully crafted pastas at Arms Reach Bistro.

attributes.about_this_biz_bio: Surprised by the use of Western Canadian wheat by traditional Italian pasta manufactures we set out to make a fresher, local pasta.
attributes.about_this_biz_history: InGrain Pastificio was conceived by the owners of Arms Reach Bistro. The Pastificio manufactures a better quality pasta made from local ancient grains and offers a small bistro styled dining room. The InGrain Pasta can be found in local retail stores around the lower mainland.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: At Ingrain Pastificio we specialize in making quality dry pasta or "pasta secca"using the traditional method of slow extrusion through bronze dies.  Our pasta is then dried slowly in order to give the best possible flavour and texture.  Our alternative grain pastas are made with locally milled flours made from organic ancient grains.  We also have salads, sandwiches, pastries and breads all made in house daily.  Our small menu is changed seasonally in order to showcase our variety of artisanal pastas.

Our restaurant makes everything from scratch daily, from pizza doughs and appetizers and salads, right down to the sauces on each plate. Our pizzas are a must try! We also have delicious bowls and appetizers!

about_this_biz_business_recommendation.description: Co-owned and supplied by InGrain Pastificio. Sample some of our wonderfully crafted pastas at Arms Reach Bistro.

Our pasta is then dried slowly in order to give the best possible flavour and texture.  Our alternative grain pastas are made with locally milled flours made from organic ancient grains.  We also have salads, sandwiches, pastries and breads all made in house daily.  Our small menu is changed seasonally in order to showcase our variety of artisanal pastas.

attributes.about_this_biz_history: Fresh, local and rustic fare prepared for you in a comfortable and charming seaside eatery. Arms Reach Bistro offers a true west coast dining experience that is dedicated our friends, neighbours and guests of Deep Cove BC. A short 20 minute drive from downtown Vancouver finds this quaint community with an abundance of outdoor activities, flip flop friendly eateries and local flavour. See you soon!

attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Feeling the buzz as you enter our bustling café, we offer a wide variety of breakfast options made with free-range eggs, sandwiches made on our tasty vegan potato bread, homemade soups, hearty salads, and so much more. We also offer gluten-free options. Top off your meal with a specialty beverage, with espresso from JJ Bean and coffee from Canterbury, and enjoy our one-of-a-kind doughnuts. Eat in or take it to go!

attributes.about_this_biz_bio: We wanted to open a great coffee shop in North Vancouver providing better food options than the average cafe.  Wanted to offer simple, fresh made to order foods to enjoy with a great cup of coffee.
attributes.about_this_biz_history: We opened May 2015.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Cafe Orso is a coffee house in Deep Cove, North Vancouver working to make the best coffee experience in the area.  We pair our fantastic coffee with fresh made to order food and source as many products from British Columbia as possible.

Our restaurant makes everything from scratch daily, from pizza doughs and appetizers and salads, right down to the sauces on each plate. Our pizzas are a must try! We also have delicious bowls and appetizers!

attributes.about_this_biz_history: japanese restaurant, deep cove osaka sushi place
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties:
salmon sashimi, dynamite roll, yam roll, chicken teriyaki
beef yaki udon, dinner box, lunch box

about_this_biz_business_recommendation.description: Co-owned and supplied by InGrain Pastificio. Sample some of our wonderfully crafted pastas at Arms Reach Bistro.

The InGrain Pasta can be found in local retail stores around the lower mainland.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: At Ingrain Pastificio we specialize in making quality dry pasta or "pasta secca"using the traditional method of slow extrusion through bronze dies.  Our pasta is then dried slowly in order to give the best possible flavour and texture.  Our alternative grain pastas are made with locally milled flours made from organic ancient grains.  We also have salads, sandwiches, pastries and breads all made in house daily.  Our small menu is changed seasonally in order to showcase our variety of artisanal pastas.

The owners of Deep Cove and Colosseum Pizza, wined and dined throughout the Mediterranean searching for the quintessential European pizza experience; they had many and developed the following Italian Classic Pizzas

Gourmands rejoice! Finally pizzas made with simple, pure ingredients like ffresh hand-picked herbs combined with the finest Italian cured meats, exquisite cheeses and only the freshest vegetables. We make the dough daily for both restaurants so you can always count on a perfect crust.

We know you will love our pizza as much as we do!

attributes.about_this_biz_history: With nine taps rotating, hearty house made soup, tacos, made to order burritos, burgers, truffle fries, hand-dipped beer battered fish and chips, the Micro Eatery promises honest handcrafted food.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Located on Deep Cove's main strip, the Micro Eatery is a modest licensed restaurant that offers fresh, wholesome, healthy food and drink for sit-in or on-the-go.  Open for lunch and dinner everyday. With nine taps rotating.
